Here you may find different organizations, practices, people responsible for them,  and distribution lists to write to.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The idea is that Shared Services and Practices are connected to Global EPAM to bring best practices (hiring, education, communities, talent development etc.) and implement them locally.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":806294,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5c1a977e-6e44-45ac-9549-acd5a47f733e/MicrosoftTeams-image the center of the Network – not management, but a common vision – to build the best Engineering company in Lithuania. To do that we need a strategy and activities to work on.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our strategy has several directions described at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/ltStrategy\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://epa.ms/ltStrategy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Here you may find more information on directions, links to our JIRA where we track our work, and a link to post your ideas and suggestions. You can raise a hand (write to the task owner) if you would like to work on anything you see together with us.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We do encourage people to bring their ideas to make EPAM Lithuania the best place to work and we value ownership to work on that together.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
